data.title: Alexisonfire facts for kids
data.text:
Alexisonfire was a Canadian post-hardcore band from St. Catharines, Ontario. Alexisonfire had six members in the band; they were George Pettit, Chris Steele, Wade MacNeil, Dallas Green, Jesse Ingelevics and Jordan "Ratbeard" Hastings. The band was formed in 2001 by the band members from Condemning Salemn, Helicon Blue and Plan 9. They released their self-titled first album on September 9, 2002. Alexisonfire split up in 2011.

Band members

George Pettit – lead vocals (2001–2011)

Dallas Green – guitar, piano, vocals (2001–2010)

Wade MacNeil – guitar, vocals (2001–2011)

Chris Steele – bass guitar (2001–2011)

Jordan "Ratbeard" Hastings – drums, percussion (2005–2011)

Jesse Ingelevics - drums, percussion (2001–2005)

Discography

Alexisonfire released 4 studio albums:

Albums

Alexisonfire (2002)

Watch Out! (2004)

Crisis (2006)

Old Crows / Young Cardinals (2009)

Images for kids
